title: How to Convert an eBook to PDF on PC or Mac

steps.title: ConvertFiles is a free website that can convert popular ebook formats (such as ePub and MOBI) to PDF documents.
steps.content: ConvertFiles is a free website that can convert popular ebook formats (such as ePub and MOBI) to PDF documents.

steps.title: It’s the gray button below the “Select a file to convert” header.
steps.content: It’s the gray button below the “Select a file to convert” header. This opens your PC or Mac’s file browser.

steps.title: The ebook’s file name now appears to the left of the Browse button.
steps.content: The ebook’s file name now appears to the left of the Browse button.

steps.title: It’s on the right side of the green “Select a file to convert” box.
steps.content: It’s on the right side of the green “Select a file to convert” box. A list of file types will appear.

steps.title: It’s on the left side of the green “Select a file to convert” box.
steps.content: It’s on the left side of the green “Select a file to convert” box. The file will now upload and convert to a PDF. When it’s finished, you’ll see a message that says “The file was successfully converted.”

steps.title: A new page with download options will appear.
steps.content: A new page with download options will appear.

steps.title: It’s the URL that ends with .pdf.
steps.content: It’s the URL that ends with .pdf. Depending on your browser and settings, this will either download the folder to your computer or open it the browser for viewing. If you’re using Chrome, click the downward-pointing arrow at the top-right corner of the document to save the document. If prompted to save the document, select a folder, and then click Save .
